item.description: The Mixer component plays a set of audio clips at the same time. See docs for more information.

items.description: The Sequencer component plays a series of audio clips one after another.

items.content: <prosody volume='x-loud'>¡Oh no!,</prosody><prosody volume='loud'>Cebollito ya no está entre nosotros, parece que le hicieron falta cuidados.<break time='.5s'/><s>Cebollito vivió desde el: 04/01/2021 hasta hoy: 06/01/2021</s>. Si quieres una nueva mascota solo di: 'abrir huevito</prosody>

items.description: The Audio component plays the provided audio file, such as an MP3 file. See docs for more information.
